whatIsVps.question: What is a Gaming VPS?
whatIsVps.answer: A Gaming VPS (Virtual Private Server) is a dedicated portion of a high-performance server optimized specifically for gaming. It provides guaranteed resources, low latency, and high availability, making it perfect for hosting game servers, streaming, or running game-related services.

ddosProtection.question: How does your DDoS protection work?
ddosProtection.answer: Our DDoS protection system uses a multi-layered approach combining hardware and software solutions. We automatically detect and mitigate attacks in real-time, ensuring your servers stay online even during large-scale attacks. All plans include basic protection, with advanced features available in higher tiers.

upgrade.question: Can I upgrade my plan later?
upgrade.answer: Yes! You can upgrade your VPS plan at any time with zero downtime. Your data and settings will automatically migrate to your new, more powerful server. We also offer a prorated billing system, so you only pay for what you use.
